name: No Time To Dice [Late submission]
description:
Very unfortunately we didn't have a playable build in time, but we had it working on Unity Project within the deadline (we submitted the project files) and we think the game itself turned out pretty nice! Check it out even if just for the fun of it.

You play as a dice and have to survive an infinite wave of clock-like monsters by avoiding and shooting them with lasers. The catch is that you have limited ammo and eveytime you pick up more, the sides of which you shoot from change (through the roll of dices!)

We did all the art and sound for the game
Programmer: Theo Trexler
3D Artist: Rodrigo Castropil
Sound Design: Carlos Frezzatti
